plot: Herleik has had an impressive production of graphic art, celebrated at exhibitions around the world, living in a home for mentally retarded. "Herleik" is a warm, human portrait, spotlighting the way we treat outsiders today.
title: Herleik - Fri som fuglen
plot_es: Herleik has had an impressive production of graphic art, celebrated at exhibitions around the world, living in a home for mentally retarded. "Herleik" is a warm, human portrait, spotlighting the way we treat outsiders today.
